body:
So finally after a long time I got unbanned. It all started when I hacked on my alt account. But let's don't talk about that. I just have to say I am really sorry for what I did. I broke rules on two other accounts :( ! 
I think it is time for a new start.

Ask away :D !
body_tagged:

replies.body:
Hey Thanks :D! 

If you play Overcast Network You May Know me :D!

1 - I really love bananas, 

2 - I love climbing but I quited though :(!

3 - Chocolate :P!

I actually joined here in 2014. But I feel pretty new :P!

replies.body:
Hey Thanks :D!

1 - My favourite food is probably see food or spareribs :P!

2 - My favourite soda is fanta. But I can't really answer the question because it's hard to decide what my favourite drink is :P!

3 - My favourite animal is probably dogs. I like rabbits too :D! I have a dog and a rabbit ;P!

4  - My favourite  OCN Map is probably Hardron or Wit's End.

5 - I prefer both :)! 

6 - Norway is a nice place. We have a lot of mountains and a lot of awesome places to fish :D!

7 - Avicus is nice! Most of the people here is very friendly. No one here annoys me :P!

8 - Brown Cheese.  I bet no one here has even heard about it :P!


Thanks for asking :D!
